member.name: M:ConfReaderLib.ConfReader.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Read Config File. Config file's format should be like as above:
A key = Value A {commentout symbol} Comment Key and value will be separated with the first '='. Blank space around '=' will be ignored.
Key and value which include blank space is acceptable. Key and value are case sensitive. Key should be unique.
member.param: If ture, check the config file's format strictly. Any meaningless chars won't be accepted

member.name: M:ConfReaderLib.ConfReader.GetValue(System.String)
member.summary: Get the value associated with the specified key.
member.returns: An element contained with the specified key.

member.name: M:ConfReaderLib.ConfReader.TryGetValue(System.String,System.String@)
member.summary: Try to get the value associated with the specified key.
member.returns: true if config contains an element with the specified key; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:ConfReaderLib.ConfReader.ChangeValue(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Change the config. Default: Save configs to the config file.
member.param: If true, update the config file immediately.

member.name: M:ConfReaderLib.ConfReader.AddConf(System.String[],System.Boolean)
member.summary: Add a config. Default: Save configs to the config file.
member.param:
Set contains key, value and comment splitted by ','. Set should be formatted as below:
"Key A,Value A,Comment A" Comment is optional.

member.name: M:ConfReaderLib.ConfReader.SaveConf
member.summary: Save configs to the config file immediately.

member.name: M:ConfReaderLib.ConfReader.Create(System.String[],System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Create a new conf file. If the file specified is exist, it will be overwritten.
member.param:
Set contains key, value and comment splitted by ','. Set should be formatted as below:
"Key A,Value A,Comment A" Comment is optional.
